init.title: Manage profiles
init.description: Each profile tracks body composition for one person. The scale routes a measurement to the matching profile based on the configured weight range.

data.action: What would you like to do?

add_profile.title: Add profile (1/3) — Basic info
add_profile.description: Enter the person's information and choose your preferred units.

add_profile_range.title: Add profile (3/3) — Weight range
add_profile_range.description: Set the weight range that identifies this person's measurements. Body composition will only be calculated when the measured weight falls within this range.

manage_profiles.title: Select a profile
manage_profiles.description: Choose the profile you want to edit or delete.

edit_profile.title: Edit profile (1/3) — Basic info
edit_profile.description: Update the profile information. If you change the weight unit, the weight range will be converted automatically. Check 'Delete this profile' to remove it.

edit_profile_height.title: Edit profile (2/3) — Height
edit_profile_height.description: Verify or update the height. Values are pre-filled from the stored height.

edit_profile_range.title: Edit profile (3/3) — Weight range
edit_profile_range.description: Verify the weight range. Values have been converted automatically if you changed the unit.
